acts.title: Act 1 — Knock at the Door
steps: A late visitor rings the bell during exchange night.
Your co-parent is visibly anxious about the disruption.
Decide: ask the visitor to wait, invite them in briefly, or postpone the chat.

acts.title: Act 2 — Clarify
steps: The visitor claims urgency; your child watches from the hallway.
You balance privacy with transparency and boundaries.

acts.title: Act 3 — Wrap
steps: You agree on next steps with the visitor and reassure your co-parent and child.
